<EFX_EXHIBIT_3>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_3"></A>
<DIV>
<HR STYLE="BORDER-TOP: MEDIUM NONE; HEIGHT: 4PX; BORDER-RIGHT: MEDIUM NONE; BORDER-BOTTOM: MEDIUM NONE; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; BORDER-LEFT: MEDIUM NONE; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN-RIGHT: AUTO" ALIGN="CENTER" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	Exhibit 3.9
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	ECOLOGY AND ENVIRONMENT INC.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	* * * * *
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	RE-STATED BY - LAWS
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	* * * * *
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	ARTICLE&#160; I
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	OFFICES
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	Section 1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The office of the Corporation shall be located in the County of Erie, State of New York.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	Section 2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The Corporation may also have offices at such other places both within and without the State of New York as the Board of Directors may from time to time determine or the business of the Corporation may require.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	ARTICLE II
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	ANNUAL AND SPECIAL MEETINGS OF SHAREHOLDERS
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-RIGHT: 14PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	Section 1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; All meetings of Shareholders for the election of Directors shall be held in the County of Erie, State of New York, at such place as may be fixed from time to time by the Board of Directors.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 1PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	Section 2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The annual meeting of Shareholders shall be held at any time during the period January 1 through April 30 at a time selected by the Board of Directors at which time the Shareholders shall elect a Board of Directors by a majority of votes cast of candidates nominated by the Board of Directors and/or a shareholder pursuant to Section 4, and transact such other business as may properly be brought before the meeting.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 7PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
	Section 3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Written or printed notice of the annual meeting stating the place, date and hour of the meeting shall be delivered not less than ten nor more than sixty days before the date of the meeting, either personally or by mail, by the persons calling the meeting, to each Shareholder of record entitled to vote at such meeting.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT">
	Section 4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Notice of Shareholder Business and Nominations.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="Z5549CB9EB769459D8FF21F77E71EBD55" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	A.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	Annual Meeting of Shareholders.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="Z6B7FDABDACB548CD91E4496CE768EF61" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 108PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	1.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Nominations for Election to the Board of Directors.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="ZA089189EA65C4C79A25E80F6FADF212D" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144.05PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	Nominations of persons for election to the Board of Directors may be made prior to an annual meeting of shareholders by holders of Class A shares with respect to Class A Directors and by holders of Class B shares with respect to Class B Directors only:
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
	- 1 -
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage72"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="Z275335F92B824CCE9B5A25A419594521" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 180PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	pursuant to the Corporation&#8217;s notice of meeting (or any supplement thereto) at the direction of the Board of Directors; or
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="Z2849B4361B8B4980837D10937744DC2B" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 180PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	by any shareholder of the Corporation who:
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ID="Z9CD5781F1D624B0D953F9F3BBA606508" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 216PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	(x)
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: AUTO; ALIGN: LEFT">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	was a shareholder of record at the time of giving of notice provided for in this Section 4A 1 and at the time of the annual meeting;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="Z52C4F978639F46CA8AE62A2D8C6B2652" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 216PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(y)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	is entitled to vote at the meeting; and
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="Z8F22577AAA774845AE4C264B1E7D0918" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 216PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(z)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	complies with the notice procedures set forth in this Section 4A 1 as to such nomination.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 215.95PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 9PT">
	This clause (ii) shall be the exclusive means for a shareholder to make nominations before an annual meeting of shareholders.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="Z13ACC7EFB7E04385A08F68974011CE37" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	Without qualification, for any nominations to be properly brought before an annual meeting by a shareholder pursuant to Section 4 A 1(a)(ii), the shareholder must have given Timely Notice (as defined below) thereof in writing to the Secretary of the Corporation. To be timely, a shareholder&#8217;s notice shall be delivered to the Secretary at the principal executive offices of the Corporation not later than the close of business on the 120th day prior to the first anniversary of the preceding year&#8217;s annual meeting and not earlier than the close of business on the 180th day prior to the first anniversary of the preceding year&#8217;s annual meeting of shareholders; (such notice, within such time periods, shall constitute &#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
<U>
	Timely Notice
</U>
</FONT>
	&#8221;). In no event shall any adjournment or postponement of an annual meeting or the announcement thereof commence a new time period for the giving of a shareholder&#8217;s notice as described above.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="Z06D152630F4B4B2A9EAFD7A5F12A4D1C" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	To be in proper written form, a shareholder&#8217;s notice to the Secretary must set forth:
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="Z4F70D5C101E04FCCAE367014D1308A8A" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 180PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	as to each person whom the shareholder proposes to nominate for election as a director:
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="ZA6416B1DEF43427E86942ED9B884BA71" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 216PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(w)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	the name, age, business address and residence address of the person;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">

</DIV>

</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage73"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="Z1510EB9025F14D308A5CBF0810156015" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	the principal occupation or employment of the person;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="ZDFA7B2B9EAB84BB288DFA63AD7A3EF05" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	the class or series and number of shares of capital stock of the Company which are owned beneficially or of record by the person; and
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="ZD3D2A11E4BA34E65BC313322016D3A26" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 216PT">
</TD>

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	any other information relating to the person that would be required to be disclosed in a proxy statement or other filings required to be made in connection with solicitations of proxies for election of directors pursuant to Section 14 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the &#8220;Exchange Act&#8221;), and the rules and regulations promulgated thereunder; and
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="ZEEC25890195146D3BCE78B25659BF2A3" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 180PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	as to the shareholder giving the notice:
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="ZBD80DF34736C4786BFECA6B963836941" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 216PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(v)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	the name and record address of such shareholder;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="ZFF12A60E9B2448138539AA825A5724FE" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 216PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(w)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	the class or series and number of shares of capital stock of the Company which are owned beneficially or of record by such shareholder;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="Z8051828547F0483DAC732FF9672C7A38" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 216PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(x)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	a description of all arrangements or understandings between such shareholder and each proposed nominee and any other person or persons (including their names) pursuant to which the nomination(s) are to be made by such shareholder;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="ZB8A462CCA5C047D1872E792072DF943A" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 216PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(y)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	a representation that such shareholder intends to appear at the meeting by a proxy, or by a qualified representative of shareholder, to nominate the persons named in its notice; and
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="Z59E908C31CB84304B17C50B3A1BE89DF" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 216PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(z)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	any other information relating to such shareholder that would be required to be disclosed in a proxy statement or other filings required to be made in connection with solicitations of proxies for election of directors pursuant to Section 14 of the Exchange Act and the rules and regulations promulgated thereunder.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
	- 3 -
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage74"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 216PT">
	Such notice must be accompanied by a written consent of each proposed nominee being named as a nominee and to serve as a director if elected.
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="Z9CFB973C359B4D2293BB0499892982CA" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	Notwithstanding anything in the second sentence of this Section 4 A 1(b) to the contrary, in the event that the number of directors to be elected to the Board of Directors of the Corporation is increased and there is no public announcement by the Corporation naming all of the nominees for director or specifying the size of the increased Board of Directors, at least one hundred (140) days prior to the first anniversary of the preceding year&#8217;s annual meeting, a shareholder&#8217;s notice required by this Section 4 A 1 shall also be considered timely, but only with respect to nominees for any new positions created by such increase, if it shall be delivered to the Secretary at the principal executive offices of the Corporation not later than the close of business on the 10th day following the day on which such public announcement is first made by the Corporation.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="ZB45749FD1E294F23B0D7DF74A0DAEEC8" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 108PT">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	2.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Proposals of Business to be Brought Before an Annual Meeting.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="Z25A8946E34454C9FA3405A24E1D4675A" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144.05PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	The proposal of business to be considered by the shareholders may be made prior to an annual meeting of shareholders only:
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="Z64CE113823D8458C97A8126D395AFB67" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 180.05PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	pursuant to the Corporation&#8217;s notice of meeting (or any supplement thereto) at the direction of the Board of Directors; or
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="ZB69272FB1AFA41B8BEDD6FC11B1730CC" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 180.05PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	by any shareholder of the Corporation who:
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="ZB6AA411A9B5D43E097CBBACA768FB93C" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 216.05PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(x)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	was a shareholder of record at the time of giving of notice provided for in this Section 4 A 2 and at the time of the annual meeting; and
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="ZB65C1BFD3A89494D8BC4BCF1C3933F0B" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 216.05PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(y)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	complies with the notice procedures set forth in this Section 4 A 2 as to such business.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT: 216PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 11PT">
	This clause (ii) shall be the exclusive means for a shareholder to submit business (other than matters properly brought under Rule 14a-8 under the Exchange Act and included in the Corporation&#8217;s notice of meeting) before an annual meeting of shareholders.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
	- 4 -
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage75"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="ZDC1938D91D624A8990D733F8196238D8" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	Without qualification, for any business to be properly brought before an annual meeting by a shareholder pursuant to Section 4 A 2(a)(ii), the shareholder must have given Timely Notice (as defined in Section 4 A 1(b) above) thereof in writing to the Secretary of the Corporation and such business must otherwise be a proper matter for shareholder action. In no event shall any adjournment or postponement of an annual meeting or the announcement thereof commence a new time period for the giving of a shareholder&#8217;s notice as described above.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="Z9AA0486324FB48D2954A651F2064E2C5" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	To be in proper form, a shareholder&#8217;s notice to the Secretary must:
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="ZF018278DC866436BA5F6D97DD1596EBD" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 180PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	set forth, as to the shareholder giving the notice and the beneficial owner, if any, on whose behalf the proposal is made:
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="Z0719CAAB07A1468B95362FBE0EA94F35" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 216PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(x)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	the name and address of such shareholder, as they appear on the Corporation&#8217;s books, and of such beneficial owner, if any;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="Z4062A0028ED74B81B5C1A6850D6C4DFF" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 216PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(y)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	the Shareholder Ownership Information (as defined in Section 4 A 1(c) above) with respect to such shareholder of record and any beneficial owner on whose behalf the proposal is made; and
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="ZEE59B31EAA7A42E39A3C021728E30623" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 216PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(z)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	any other information relating to such shareholder and beneficial owner, if any, that would be required to be disclosed in a proxy statement or other filings required to be made in connection with solicitations of proxies for the proposal pursuant to Section 14 of the Exchange Act and the rules and regulations promulgated thereunder; and
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="Z61BA3036A1724C15BE123D8EC7502F07" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 180PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	set forth:
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="ZFB7431FBD7C14945AA90873222E56AB1" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 216PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(x)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	a brief description of the business desired to be brought before the meeting (including the text of any resolutions proposed for consideration), the reasons for conducting such business at the meeting and any material interest of such shareholder and beneficial owner, if any, in such business; and
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">

</DIV>

</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage76"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="Z220FC691F51447B482BA71B64FC0F567" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 216.05PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(y)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	a description of all agreements, arrangements and understandings between such shareholder and beneficial owner, if any, and any other person or persons (including their names) in connection with the proposal of such business by such shareholder.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="Z06B8CF85AC5B45689D74D409D2864F56" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 108PT">
	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	3.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Submission of Questionnaire, Representation and Agreement.
</FONT>
	To
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	be eligible to be a nominee for election or re-election as a director of the Corporation, a person must deliver (in accordance with the time periods prescribed for delivery of notice under Section 4 of this Article II or within 10 days after receipt from Secretary) to the Secretary at the principal executive offices of the Corporation a written questionnaire with respect to the background and qualification of such person and the background of any other person or entity on whose behalf the nomination is being made (which questionnaire shall be provided by the Secretary upon written request in substantially the same form as that filled out by the existing Board of Directors for the Corporation&#8217;s annual proxy statement) and a written representation and agreement (in the form provided by the Secretary upon written request) that such person:
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="Z071E60EE82524F36BD4D0A1C592635CC" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144.05PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	is not and will not become a party to:
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="ZC4F4C3440BDE4C6F85CE3E9E15465B76" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 180.05PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	any agreement, arrangement or understanding with, and has not given any commitment or assurance to, any person or entity as to how such person, if elected as a director of the Corporation, will act or vote on any issue or question (a &#8220;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
<U>
	Voting
</U>
</FONT>
	&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
<U>
	Commitment
</U>
</FONT>
	&#8221;) that has not been disclosed to the Corporation;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="Z102C9B26AD05439D8A19EF2ABA1D161E" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 180.05PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	any Voting Commitment that could limit or interfere with such person&#8217;s ability to comply, if elected as a director of the Corporation, with such person&#8217;s fiduciary duties under applicable law; or
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="Z2DAEC783382B4C3991F3F95A6B8A94E9" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 180.05PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	any conflicting fiduciary duty.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">

	- 6 -
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="Z7C1171C85A75484BBA3C31C976605529" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144.05PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	is not and will not become a party to any agreement, arrangement or understanding with any person or entity other than the Corporation with respect to any direct or indirect compensation, reimbursement or indemnification in connection with service or action as a director that has not been disclosed therein; and
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="ZD8D2D20C4BC942C18439F5FFABAB5D02" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 35.95PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	in such person&#8217;s individual capacity and on behalf of any person or entity on whose behalf the nomination is being made, would be in compliance, if elected as a director of the Corporation, and will comply with all applicable publicly disclosed corporate governance, conflict of interest, confidentiality and stock ownership and trading policies and guidelines of the Corporation.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

	&#160;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	B.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	Special Meetings of Shareholders.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="ZBD488DDA27F04750AC8F9624C7C3B259" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 108PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	1.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	Special Meetings of the Shareholders, for any purpose or purposes, unless otherwise prescribed by statute or by the Certificate of Incorporation, may be called by the Chairman of the Board of Directors, or the holders of not less than a majority of all the shares entitled to vote at the meeting based upon the shares weighted voting rights.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="Z0DDF139CCA4F42FF86042AA5634AE85F" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; WIDTH: AUTO">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	Only such business shall be conducted at a special meeting of shareholders as shall have been brought before the meeting pursuant to the Corporation&#8217;s notice of meeting. Nominations of persons for election to the Board of Directors may be made at a special meeting of shareholders at which directors are to be elected pursuant to the Corporation&#8217;s notice of meeting:
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="ZCD1C5D6FA32A41DB9B8D1AE04F03BC38" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	(a)

	by or at the direction of the Board of Directors; or
</DIV>
</TD>

</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">

	(b)

<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'">
	provided that the Board of Directors has determined that directors shall be elected at such meeting, by any shareholder of the Corporation who:
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TABLE ID="Z90608AF0262E494AB839AD5A3C827FC1" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN'; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</DIV>

<DIV>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

	- 7 -
</FONT>

<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
